entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Saint-Quentin
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 17 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11 except minus 17 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11 except minus 17 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 60%
